description.en: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?

異世界NTR～用最強技能令摯友的女人墜落的方法～

NTR in Another World: Sullying My Best Friend's Women With the Strongest Skill

description.en:
This shitty world that's nothing but a trashy game, he and I will definitely escape it together. So, all these annoying women trying to take advantage of him are just a nuisance. What's worse, it seems like he's beginning to have some feelings for them.

That's why, for his sake, I'll eat them up first. But, just what is this power…?
description.es: Este mundo de mierda que no es más que un juego basura, él y yo definitivamente escaparemos juntos. Entonces, todas estas mujeres molestas que intentan aprovecharse de él son solo una molestia. Lo que es peor, él parece que está comenzando a sentir algo por ellas. Por eso, por su bien, las comeré primero. Pero, ¿qué es este poder…?

description.en: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
description.vi: Đây là câu chuyện về gã chủ nhân mua nô lệ, chăm sóc giáo dục các bé lên người để hiện thực hoá giấc mơ dàn harem lý tưởng
description.es-la: Un hombre compra 3 esclavas Lolis para así poder criarlas y convertirlas en mujeres de su agrado para que posteriormente cuando crezcan completamente de acuerdo a sus gustos pueda hacerles el sin respeto a gusto las veces que quiera
description.pt-br: Um homem compra três pequenas escravas e começa a transformá-las em garotas perfeitas para seu harém.

description.en: Pairing: Akai Shuichi x Furuya Rei

title.en: There Is No Forgiveness From the Regressed Lady

description.en:
Cassia, stripped of everything by her brother's lover and best friend, resolves to rewrite her twisted fate by traveling back in time. Her first objective: prevent her brother and the villainess from ever falling in love. Yet, she quickly discovers that altering human emotions, even with the ability to manipulate time, proves impossible.
In a moment of despair, a hero from the North emerges – Cain, the emperor's half-brother and a grand duke condemned to die for treason. Upon meeting him, Cassia instinctively understands: this man holds the key to reshaping her destiny, mirroring her own past struggles.
Now, Cassia must navigate the intricate threads of fate and love, with Cain at her side, to reclaim what was taken from her and forge a new path forward against all odds.
description.ko:
오빠의 연인이자 절친에게 모든 걸 빼앗긴 '카시아'.
과거로 돌아가 잘못된 운명을 만회하고자 한다. 

그렇게 세운 첫 번째 목표는 바로
오빠와 악녀의 연애를 막는 것!

하지만 회귀자조차도 바꿀 수 없던 것이 사람의 감정이었으니…

좌절의 순간,
그녀 앞에 북방의 영웅이 나타난다.

현 황제의 이복동생이자
반역죄로 몰려 처형당할 대공 '카인'.

과거에 자신과 같은 말로를 맞이한 요주의 인물을 보며,
그녀는 본능적으로 직감한다.

이 사람이 바로 운명을 바꿀 열쇠라는 것을.

Аля-сан иногда кокетничает со мной по-русски

altTitles.de: Alya verbirgt manchmal ihre Gefühle auf Russisch

altTitles.en: Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
My Deskmate Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian

altTitles.ja-ro: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san

altTitles.pl: Alya Czasami Ukrywa Swoje Uczucia Używając Rosyjskiego

altTitles.mn: Аля Заримдаа Орос Хэлээр Сэтгэлээ Нуудаг

description.en:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
description.it: Masachika Kuze è seduto accanto ad Alya, una ragazza di origine russa e antenati giapponesi. Lei è bella, altezzosa e una studentessa eccezionale, mentre Masachika è secchione e noto per essere un fannullone. È un bersaglio facile per i suoi commenti in russo, che lei è fin troppo felice di tradurre - tranne per il fatto che lui può capire cosa sta dicendo in realtà!
description.ja: 「И на меня тоже обрати внимание」隣の席に座る絶世の銀髪美少女、アーリャさんは時々ロシア語を話す。本人は俺を罵倒していると言うのだが…事実は違う！さっきのロシア語、彼女は「私のことかまってよ」と言っていたのだ！実は俺、久世政近のロシア語リスニングはネイティブレベルなのである。そんな事とは露知らず、今日も甘々なロシア語でデレてくるアーリャさん！全生徒憧れの的、超ハイスペックなロシアンJKとの青春ラブコメディ！
description.mn:
Аля гэх, хэнтэй ч зүйрлэшгүй үзэсгэлэн, мөнгөлөг үстэй охин, заримдаа дотроо оросоор шивнэдэг. Тэр хэлэхдээ, намайг муулах үедээ л тэгдэг гэж хэлсэн...гэхдээ би орос хэл мэднэ! Саяхан "Надад анхаарал тавиач" гэж хэлэхийг нь би сонссон!

Масачика Күзэ орос хэлийг уугуул түвшний чадамжаар ойлгодог, гэвч Аля үүнийг мэдэхгүй...тийм болохоор өөрийнхөө сэтгэлийг орос хэлээр нуудаг!
description.pl: Masachika Kuze siedzi obok Alyi, dziewczyny pochodzenia rosyjsko - japońskiego. Jest piękną, wyniosłą i wyjątkową uczennicą, podczas gdy Masachika jest kujonem znanym z bycia leniem. Jest on więc łatwym celem dla jej komentarzy, które chętnie tłumaczy na rosyjski - z wyjątkiem tego, że on może zrozumieć, co mówi naprawdę!
description.ru: Манга по одноимённой новелле! Главный герой – Кудзе Масачика, учится в частном институте Сейрей, куда частенько попадают ученики из разных стран. Вдруг в классе Кудзе появилась новенькая. Девушка с бледной, почти прозрачной кожей, которую невозможно было увидеть у настоящих японцев, и длинными голубыми глазами-щелочками, сияющими, как сапфиры. Это была Аля – Русская девушка, что переехала в Японию...
description.vi:
“И наменятоже обрати внимание”

“Hở, gì thế?”

“Có gì đâu? Tôi nói ‘Cái tên này đúng là đồ ngốc’ ý mà.”

“Cậu thôi cái trò mắng người ta bằng tiếng Nga đi!?”

Arya - cô nàng xinh đẹp tuyệt trần có mái tóc bạch kim ngồi cạnh tôi - đang nở một nụ cười đắc thắng...

Nhưng sự thật thì, câu tiếng Nga cô ấy vừa nói có nghĩa là [Hãy để ý đến tôi đi] cơ!

Tôi - Kuze Masachika - là người có khả năng nghe hiểu tiếng Nga thông thạo như người bản xứ. Nhưng không hề hay biết điều đó, cô nàng Arya hôm nay vẫn tiếp tục thể hiện những cảm xúc rất ngọt ngào bằng tiếng Nga khiến tôi không thể ngừng cười!?

Câu chuyện tình thanh xuân hài hước của tôi với cô nàng nữ sinh trung học gốc Nga hoàn hảo đã bắt đầu như thế...
description.pt-br:
Minha colega de classe que senta ao meu lado é meio-russa, chamada Alya, ela tá sempre provocando e sussurrando em russo, só que ela não sabe que entendo muito bem o idioma russo. 

Assim começa um grande comédia romântica.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

altTitles.ja: 幽霊と疲れた会社員

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

altTitles.ja: 皇帝と女騎士

altTitles.vi: Hoàng đế và Nữ hiệp sĩ

description.en:
Pollyanna is an unremarkable girl in a noble family. Her parents send her to military conscription hoping she'll die quickly in battle. Left only with her wits and her strength, Pollyanna fights to rise up in the ranks. One day, she meets an ardent king, one who finally acknowledges her worth. Moved by his dream for unity, Pollyanna vows to fight for him. But now the young king is slowly realizing this stalwart knight has also conquered his heart.

---
After six years of pointless war between her country, the Kingdom of Ehas, and their neighbor enemies, the Kingdom of Cukda, aged 20, the woman soldier and former petty officer Pauliana Kellenbell has been defeated and captured in a storming attack by the army of another enemy nation, the Kingdom of Acrea, an attack she had personally predicted but fell on deaf ears by her superiors. She has been desperately trying to survive in men's society, but it was all in vain, her noble birthright having been taken away by her family by being sent to war, and having all her efforts crushed down by the fact that she's a woman in the all-male army of Ehas.

Acrea's young king, Lucius, sees her struggle and potential, and makes an unexpected offer. He dreams of becoming the first emperor to conquer the South continent and its sea. Pauliana swears a life-long allegiance to Lucius for acknowledging her, becoming his knight and most trusted advisor, bestowing her with the name Pauliana Winter. However, in the end, Lucius is just an emperor on the battlefield that had awakened his love for Pauliana!

---

description.ja:
前妻との娘である「ポリアナ」は家族にとってただの邪魔もの――。
父はポリアナが戦死することを望み強制的に戦場に行かせるのだが…自分を見捨てた親への復讐と生き残るため必死に訓練し、疲弊した戦地の男世界でも耐えぬくポリアナ。
しかし、敵国の新王「ルクソス」が率いるアクレア軍の侵攻により、ポリアナは絶体絶命の危機に――!?
description.ko: “오늘따라 경이 귀여워 보이는구나.” “폐하, 어디 불편하십니까?” 미모와 능력을 갖춘 대륙의 패왕, 남자보다 거친 여기사에게 반하다?! 전우애가 연애로 발전하기까지, 진중함과 유머의 황금비로 풀어내는 새로운 스타일의 ‘여기사 로망’! 때는 전시, 여기사 폴리아나는 적국 아크레아의 군대에 패배한다. 그녀는 남자들의 사회에서 살아남기 위해 필사적으로 노력해 왔으나 이제는 허망히 죽을 신세. 하지만 아크레아의 젊은 왕 룩소스 1세는 그녀의 사투를 보고 뜻밖
description.tr: Pauliana, düşman ulus ordusu Acrea tarafından yenildi ve yakalandı. Umutsuzca erkekler toplumunda hayatta kalmaya çalışıyordu, ama hepsi boşunaydı. Acrea’nın genç kralı Lucius, mücadelesine tanık oldu ve beklenmedik bir teklifte bulundu. Onun hayali savaşı sürdürmek ve Güney kıtasını ve denizini fetheden ilk imparator olabilmekiti. Pauliana, Lucius’a, onu kabul ettiği için ömür boyu sürecek bir bağlılık sözü verdi. Ancak, sonunda, Lucius sadece Pauliana’ya olan sevgisini savaş alanında uyandırmiş bir imparatordu.
description.uk:
Пауліану подолали, і вона була захоплена у полон армією ворожої країни Акрії. Вона відчайдушно намагалася вижити в чоловічому товаристві, але все було марно. Молодий король Акрії, Люціус, побачив її боротьбу та зробив неочікувану пропозицію. Він мріє продовжити війну та стати першим імператором, що скорить Південний континент і море. Пауліана присягнула на вірність Люціусу за те, що він її визнав. Однак, зрештою, Люціус - просто імператор, який на полі бою усвідомив свої почуття до Пауліани.

---

Would you like to reverse time?]
[All your abilities will be reset.]

“February 28th, 1985. The day I was born.”

before it all begins.

The Way To Conquer A Different World As A Reincarnated Porter

description.en: A man who yearns for freedom is reincarnated and he chooses the undesirable job "Carrier"--The fastest way to conquer both women and other world with wisdom and courage! A new erotic fantasy series from Nocturne Novels!

アンデッドアンラック カラー版

altTitles.vi: Bất tử và bất hạnh (Bản màu)

description.en: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…

altTitles.ja: 文豪ストレイドッグス

altTitles.en: Stray Dogs of the Literary Masters

description.en: Nakajima Atsushi was kicked out of his orphanage, and now he has no place to go and no food. While he is standing by a river, on the brink of starvation, he rescues a man whimsically attempting suicide. That man is Dazai Osamu, and he and his partner Kunikida are members of a very special detective agency. They have supernatural powers, and deal with cases that are too dangerous for the police or the military. They're tracking down a tiger that has appeared in the area recently, around the time Atsushi came to the area. The tiger seems to have a connection to Atsushi, and by the time the case is solved, it is clear that Atsushi's future will involve much more of Dazai and the rest of the detectives!
description.ru: Нашего героя выгнали из детского дома. Стоя у реки, он думал о голодной смерти, но чудом умудрился спасти самоубийцу. Этот человек, оказалось, состоит в детективном агентстве. В агентстве со сверхъестественными способностями. И только им подвластно решение проблем, за которые боятся браться даже военные. Теперь жизнь нашего героя изменится кардинально. А как именно читайте далее.

description.en:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
description.es-la: Juntos o se hunden juntos, ¿se descubrirán mentiras sobre el amor? Están ligados por negocios, fingiendo ser pareja para contrarrestar los escándalos del escritor y lograr ser el primer lugar en el buscador.

altTitles.ja: 運命の巻戻士

description.en:
The world's most easy-to-understand and hot loop manga!

An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case! The first loop manga in CoroCoro's 45-year history, a must-see!

title.en: When the Black Wolf Calls Me

altTitles.en: When the Black Wolf Beckons Me

description.en:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"

title.en: A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal

altTitles.ja: 男女比1:39の平行世界は思いのほか普通

altTitles.ja-ro: Danjohi 1:39 no Heikou Sekai wa Omoi no Hoka Futsuu

altTitles.es-la: Un Mundo Donde 1 Hombre cada 39 Mujeres es lo Normal
El mundo paralelo con una relación de hombres y mujeres de 1:39 resulta ser inesperadamente normal

description.en:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

---

Alternative version: [A Parallel World With a 1:39 Male to Female Ratio Is Unexpectedly Normal 【R18】](https://mangadex.org/title/dcf01405-2bb3-40a4-bd8b-af1eb90c8e8e)
description.ja: 主人公「佐藤 蒼」はひょんなことから男女比1：39の平行世界の自分と入れ替わってしまう。入れ変わった先には、優しい家族や可愛い女性ばかりそんな彼女たちの外面を見て主人公は「男女の数が変化しただけで他はそんなに変わらないな」と安心する。だが、彼女たちの内面では葛藤や煩悩に溢れかえっていた。
description.es-la: Sou Satou, un chico de secundaria que fue transportado a un mundo paralelo. Este mundo resulta ser que la relación de hombres y mujeres es de 1:39, esto quiere decir que por cada 1 hombre en el mundo hay 39 mujeres, sin embargo, parece ser que este nuevo mundo resulta ser inesperadamente ¿normal?...

description.en: On the first day of school, six students felt their hearts flutter all at the very same moment in time! This is the story of each of them pursuing and being pursued out of their earnest wishes for love.

Murong Qian, a fortune teller, foresees a disaster threatening his family. In a bid to save them, he aims to seduce the prince and gain power, only to discover that Prince He Cangxiao has a deadly fear of men. Yet, caught in the intoxicating allure of desire’s flowers, they share a night of passion. Now, torn between fear and lust, He Cangxiao can't stop craving Murong Qian. A whirlwind of pleasure ensues, engulfing them for a thousand and one nights!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official English](https://yaoi.kijimam.space/studio/?product=ebook1001-nights-series)

title.en: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken

altTitles.ja: 異世界で配信活動をしたら大量のヤンデレ信者を生み出してしまった件

altTitles.en: When I started streaming in another world, I ended up creating a large number of Yandere followers.

description.en:
Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming.

Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself.

This is not the tale of just a streamer… but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
description.ja: 剣と魔法の世界アタラシア――その世界に生きる一人の転生者が配信活動に手を出した。 数多くの娯楽はあれど、そのようなモノが存在しなかった世界で彼はたちまち有名になった。 これは異世界で唯一の配信者……ではなく、ハイシンシャになろうと考えた少年の物語である。
description.vi: Anh nhân vật chính của chúng ta được chuyển sinh sang thế giới có sự tồn tại của ma thuật. Sở hữu trong mình sức mạnh bá ko tả nổi, anh sẽ đánh bại quái vật để kiếm sống ư? Không, anh chê, anh muốn theo đuổi đam mê, anh muốn làm streamer để kiếm sống.

title.en: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 元 痣だらけの彼女が心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Girlfriend, Who Used to be Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pl: Martwię Się o Moją Dziewczynę, Która Była Kiedyś Pokryta w Bliznach

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей девушке, которая раньше была вся в синяках

altTitles.tr: Eskiden Bandajlarla Kaplanmış Olan Kız Arkadaşım Hakkında Endileşeniyorum

altTitles.ro: Sunt Îngrijorat Pentru Iubita Mea, Care Obișnuia să Fie Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.es-la: Estoy preocupado por mi novia que solía estar cubierta de moretones

description.en: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
description.es-la: Continuación de [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).

altTitles.ja: ぼくらの夏が裂けていく

description.en: A teenage boy returns to his remote home island from the mainland. While people stopped wearing masks there, on the island the rules to wear masks outside at all times are still surprisingly strict. Could the reason be something different than corona?

title.en: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni: Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.ja: 勇者と呼ばれた後に ―そして無双男は家族を創る―

altTitles.ja-ro: Yuusha to Yobareta Ato ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru

altTitles.en: After Being Called a Hero - The Unrivaled Man Starts a Family -

description.en: In a world where humans and demons clash — the one who decimated the Demon Lord’s army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd’s companion!? This is the story of a man, hailed as the strongest, yet unable to recognize his own worth, finding a “family”.
description.ja: 人間と魔族が争う世界――魔王軍を壊滅させたのはたったひとりの勇者、ロイドという男だった。魔王から神に近いとまで言われた力を持つロイドは戦後、王により辺境の領主を命じられ、遠ざけられた。さらにその地に棲む皇帝竜の討伐も頼まれたが、早々に倒してしまう。しかし敗れた竜は、美しい女性に変化し、ロイドの伴侶になることに!?これは最強と呼ばれながらも自分自身の価値を見つけられなかった男が「家族」を見つける物語。

title.en: N Methods to Make the Scum Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zha Nan Gameover De N Zhong Fang Fa

altTitles.vi: Tôi Ở Di Giới Khai Ngư Đường
N Cách Để Khiến Tra Nam Gameover

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhā Nán Gameover De N Zhǒng Fāng Fǎ

description.en: I fell from a building strangely when I appeared? Am I dead or alive after falling from the 18th floor? Suddenly an NPC wanted to play a game with me? I quickly traveled to various novels, met a lot of handsome men, activated the cheat code to kill all the scum, and completed the mission in the other world to come back to life? Wait a minute! Why am I in hard mode when I first arrive? !

title.en: Tensura Nikki: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.en: The Slime Diaries: That Time I Got Reincarnated as a Slime

altTitles.ja-ro: Tensura Nikki Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken

altTitles.ja: 転スラ日記 転生したらスライムだった件

description.en:
This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 3 of the Light Novel.

"Dear diary… I got reincarnated as a slime."

Even in another world, lives aren't always on the line. There's plenty of work to be done, from feeding the community and forging the items the community needs; as well as plenty of play ...and hijinks throughout! Join Rimuru and friends as they kick back and enjoy their daily lives.
description.it: Questa è la serie spin-off ufficiale 4-koma di "Vita da slime"! A differenza della storia principale, questa vede la vita quotidiana di Limur da una nuova prospettiva!
description.es-la:
Este Manga Spinoff tiene contenido basado de los Volumenes 3,4, y 5 de la Novela Ligera.

"Querido diario... me reencarne como un slime."

Incluso en otro mundo, las vidas no siempre estan en la linea. Hay mucho trabajo que hacer, desde alimentar a la comunidad y forjar los items que necesitan; como tambien hay un monton de juego... ¡Y travesuras!. Unete a Rimuru y sus amigos mientras que se relajan y disfrutan de sus vidas diarias.

title.en: Hana Yori Dango: Boys Over Flowers

altTitles.es: No me lo digas con flores

altTitles.ja: 流星花园
花より男子

description.en:
Eitoku Academy is a school that caters to children and from rich, high-society families. Hence, Makino, who comes from a poor family, is considered by others as the "weed" of the school. The school is ruled by the "Flower Four" group, more commonly known as the F4. The F4 leader, and son of the wealthiest, most powerful family in Japan, Domyouji Tsukasa, takes an interest in Tsukushi because she is the only girl at Eitoku who does not fawn over him. However, his hot-headed nature and bullying ways are originally a major turn-off for Tsukushi, who has her sights set on Rui Hanazawa.  
  
Volume 37 is comprised of three short stories that happen after the ending

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士クロスボーン・ガンダム ゴースト

description.en: Universal Century 0153. 17 years have passed since the "Steel Seven" defeated the remnants of the Jupiter Empire. As a new conflict brews between a Side 2 faction known as the Zanscare Empire and the League Militaire/Earth Federation. A high schooler on Side 3, Font Baud, is hunted by Zanscare special forces when he discovers their secret Newtype weapon. However, he encounters a little girl, who is accompanied by a blind man and is rescued by the strange return of a mobile suit that defeated the Jovians.

altTitles.ja: ヘルシング

altTitles.en: Hellsing: The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of a Vampire Hunter
The Legend of the Vampire Hunter

description.en:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---
description.es: La familia Van Helsing ha sido la némesis del conde Drácula y de toda la raza de vampiros.Ahora se ha convertido en toda una organización cuyo mejor cazador,un vampiro,usará el humor y la violencia para cumplir su destino...y ha dado origen a una exitosa serie de animación.
description.fr: En Angleterre, l'organisation secrète Hellsing agit pour protéger le pays des forces du mal, dont les vampires. Force de frappe de l'Église protestante, ce groupe dispose d'une arme secrète des plus inattendues: Alucard, vampire surpuissant et apparemment invulnérable. Mais leur mission se corsera quand ils devront faire face au Vatican et aux brigades anti-monstres de l'État le plus petit du monde...
description.hu: A Hellsing Királyi Protestáns Lovagrend az Angol Korona évszázados szervezete – egy család, amelynek a feladata a birodalom védelme a természetfeletti és istentelen veszedelmektől. A lovagrend lelke Sir Integra Wingates Hellsing, legfőbb fegyvere pedig Alucard, a szervezet szolgálatában álló titokzatos ősvámpír, valamint – újabban – Seras Victoria, egy balul elsült bevetésen született vámpírlány.
description.it: Londra, un'antica casata nobiliare combatte contro i vampiri da generazioni; si tratta dell'agenzia segreta HELLSING, comandata da Lady Integra Farbuke Wingates Hellsing.Integra, succeduta alla morte del padre, stipula un patto di sangue con il on il vampiro Alucard e lo induce a battersi contro le tremende forze occulte che minacciano il pianeta, dando vita a una delle saghe horror più famose nel panorama dei manga.
description.ja: 幽霊船デメテル号に乗ってアーカードが遂に来た！かくして役者は全員演壇へと登り、暁の惨劇は幕を上げる・・・・・・
description.lt:
Kažkur Anglijoje gyvuoja slapta organizacija, sukurta tam, kad apgintų karalienę ir šalį nuo įvairiausio plauko pabaisų. Sveiki atvykę į paslaptingąjį Hellsing – organizaciją, kuri žino, kaip spręsti problemas, kai iš tamsos išnyra vampyrai, gūlai ir kitokios šlykštynės. Be to, organizacijos nariai gali pasigirti puikiu ginklu.

Klausiate, kokiu? Ogi kitu vampyru, kuris šimtmečius tobulino savąjį kovos meną ir todėl yra bemaž neįveikiamas. Apsiginklavęs milžinišku pistoletu, užtaisytu ypatingomis sidabrinėmis kulkomis, Alukardas kelia siaubą ne tik nemirėliams. Tačiau ne tai svarbiausia. Skaitytoją visų pirma priblokš kandus šių istorijų sąmojis, neįtikėtinos iliustracijos ir beprotiškai kruvinas veiksmas. Nenuostabu, jog ši manga užkariavo visą pasaulį.
description.pt: Para resolver o caso de um estranho pastor de hábitos macabros, é chamada a Organização Hellsing, responsável por livrar a Inglaterra dos males que espreitam na noite. Alucard é a principal arma da Hellsing contra estes seres, e sua história se cruza com a da novata Seras Victoria e a da chefe da organização, Integra Wingates Hellsing.
description.ru: Вампир Алукард - древний и могущественный, вампир "в самом расцвете сил". Все что его интересует - это поиски по-настоящему сильного противника. Убивать и умирать - какие еще могут быть развлечения в бессмертной жизни? И организация "Хеллсинг", члены которой посвятили себя борьбе с порождениями тьмы вроде него. Что может их связывать кроме желания уничтожить друг друга? Но, как ни странно, Алукард и Хеллсинг прекрасно работают вместе… и будут работать ровно до тех пор, пока древний вампир не найдет для себя действительно могущественного и интересного врага.
description.tr:
Hortlaklar, vampirler, canavarlar... Kraliyet Protestan Şövalyeler Kardeşliği, yani Hellsing, onlarla kadim zamanlardan beri mücadele ediyor. Nasıl mı? Tabii ki yüksek teknoloji ürünü silahlar ve ekipmanla... Üstelik bunları kullanan kişi tam bir vampir uzmanı. Hellsing sizi aksiyon ve kan yüklü bir dünyaya davet ediyor.

Bu sayıda Hellsing Organizasyonu'nun avlarıyla ve düşmanlarıyla tanışıyoruz. Hiç beklenmeyen bazı gelişmeler, Integra Hellsing'in tüm planlarını bozuyor. Üstelik, kurumun yakın geçmişinde yaşanan güç oyunları ve entrikalar da karşımıza çıkıyor. Bakalım Hellsing bütün bu olanlarla başa çıkabildi mi ve olacaklarla başa çıkabilecek mi?
description.es-la: Llega uno de los mayores éxitos de los últimos años! Hellsing, una organización auspiciada por el gobierno británico, controlada por la implacable Integra, busca exterminar a los despiadados vampiros, cuya actividad va en aumento y causa pánico en la población. Su principal arma es Alucard, un sádico vampiro liberado por Integra después de años de reclusión. Junto a él, Victoria Seras, una chica policía ahora mitad vampiro. El peligro? Una posible guerra mundial. Mucho más explícito, violento, humorístico y adulto que la serie de TV.

altTitles.ja: ダブルヘリクス ブロッサム

description.en: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
description.ja:
2人の少女が織りなすSFバディアクション

警察官である19歳の少女・東雲菊は、とある事件を捜査している最中、大けがを負ってしまう。現代の医療では治療不可能とされた彼女に残された唯一の道は、長き眠りにつく「コールドスリープ」であった・・・。次に彼女の意識が戻ったのは、60年後の日本――！

そこで犯罪を取り締まっているのは、彼女が所属していたかつての警察ではなく、民間の警察組織だった。そうした中、重犯罪者・月下香とバディを組むことに…。長き眠りから覚めた菊と、超能力を使う香。

altTitles.ja: 二日月に栖む

description.en: Yousuke keeps plenty busy with his job as a model. Due to certain circumstances, he has to work with Mitsuki who has been transferred from another company, but their first meeting ends up being a disastrous "half-asleep kiss"...!? The long awaited "Falling Star" spin-off of a new story featuring Yousuke starts now!

altTitles.ja: ぼくはまだ噛めない

description.en:
“Or did you want to kiss me?”
Oscar is an Alpha who attacked his older brother when they were children.
He finds a kindred spirit in Luca, also an Alpha, when he goes to university in London.
Both aiming to find their pair, Oscar slowly opens up to Luca, who is his exact opposite.
One night, when Oscar confides in Luca that he hasn’t been able to get an erection lately, Luca replies “I’ll help you get off”…?
A wounded Alpha finds his salvation through a minor miracle.
The long-awaited spin-off of “Kimi wa Mou Kamenai”!

title.en: My Daughter Is the Final Boss

altTitles.fr: Ma fille est le boss final

altTitles.it: Mia figlia è il boss finale

altTitles.ja: 俺の娘はラスボス

altTitles.zh: 我的女儿是最终的老板

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的女兒是最終的老闆

altTitles.es-la: Mi Hija es el Jefe Final

description.en:
Lee Seo-jun could only watch as his daughter, the witch Lee Seol-ah, turned into the wicked final boss who destroyed the world and brought upon his death. 

Though never a good dad, as he loses consciousness, Seo-jun gets a new quest.

[Change the future.] 

Upon awakening, he sees a 5-year-old Seol-ah standing before him. Now, Seo-jun must raise Seol-ah to avoid the misfortunes that originally turned her wicked and become the caring father she never had.

The price of failure? Only the end of the world.


---
**Alt. Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%B4-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%80-%EC%B5%9C%EC%A2%85-%EB%B3%B4%EC%8A%A4/2964)

description.fr:
Ma fille a détruit le monde. À la fin de celui-ci, je suis mort impuissant. Quand j'ai rouvert les yeux, ma fille de cinq ans était devant moi. <Quête unique : Changer le futur> Arrêtez les cinq malheurs de Seol-Ah Lee. (0/5) Une nouvelle chance m'a été accordée. Si elle est mal éduquée, le monde périra.

description.id:
Putriku menghancurkan dunia ini, di akhir hidupku aku mati tidak berdaya. Ketika aku membuka mata, putriku yang berusia 5 tahun berada di hadapanku. Aku mengalami regresi dan harus mencegah 5 nasib buruk Seol-Ah (0/5) Aku diberikan kesempatan sekali lagi, untuk mengubah semuanya dan menebus semua kesalahanku di masa lalu Jika dibiarkan begitu saja, maka dunia akan binasa. - Diary Lee Seojun

내 딸이 세상을 멸망시켰다.
엇나감의 끝에서, 나는 무력하게 죽음을 맞이했다.
다시 눈을 떴을 때, 내 눈앞에는 다섯 살의 딸이 있었다.

<고유 퀘스트 : 미래 바꾸기>
이설아의 다섯 가지 불행을 막으십시오.(0/5)

다시 한번 주어진 기회.
잘못 키우면, 세상이 멸망한다.

description.ru:
Моя дочь разрушила мир. В конце её дивергенции я беспомощно умер.
Когда снова открыл глаза, передо мной стояла моя пятилетняя дочь.
[Остановите пять несчастий Соль-а Ли. (0/5)]
Мне дали ещё один шанс. Если её неправильно воспитать, то мир погибнет.

description.en:
The Demon King has been defeated, and now the Demon World is running a contest to choose his successor.   
A muscular and high-level human named Helck has joined and says that he wants to destroy all HUMANS. Is he serious?  
Red Vamirio, one of the Four Heavenly Kings of the whole Demon Empire, is monitoring the contest and can't believe this. What's the secret behind Helck and the human world?
description.pt: Helck é o herói que derrotou um dos reis demônio. Quando um rei demônio morre, um novo deve ser declarado. Isso é feito através de um torneio de artes marciais, onde o mais forte se torna o novo governante. Vamiro, um dos Grandes Reis Demônios, descobre que Helck é um dos participantes do torneio e tem ganhado todas as lutas! Qual poderia ser o motivo? Se um humano se torna o próximo rei demônio, o que isso significa para o reino demoníaco?

description.en: Kikuri Hiroi (25 years old). She is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK", and she loves alcohol. She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment of the live house, so she seems to be short of money. She lives in a 52-year-old apartment without a bath, and sometimes borrows showers from her friends and acquaintances. She is regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, which she counters with a "happiness spiral" with the help of alcohol. What is her daily life like...?!

Ruud Denatos' life of living in the shadow of his talented older brother Aesir, a genius dragon slayer, ends when Aesir is killed in a brutal battle. But after the fight, a hidden dragon lord appears and sends Ruud to a past where Aesir doesn't exist!

In order to find answers and his older brother, Ruud takes Aesir's place and wows the school with his skills and knowledge. But will Ruud continue to impress the academy, or will the lackluster skills of his past catch up to him?

သူရဲ့အကိုက သေခံပြီ ကယ်သွားတယ်
အယ့်တော့မှ သူ့အကိုကို မုန်းတာမဟုတ်ပဲ

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム外伝 THE BLUE DESTINY

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden: The Blue Destiny

description.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story: The Blue Destiny is a one volume manga based on the Sega Saturn game developed by Bandai, written and illustrated by Takayama Mizuho, published by Kodansha and serialized by Comic Bom Bom in 1997. The story revolves around Yuu Kajima, who is a soldier with the Earth Federation Forces during the One Year War, testing new technology before it's mass-produced. During a routine battle, he and his teammates come under attack from a mysterious blue Mobile Suit that attacks like a monster, barely escaping with their lives. Returning to base, Yuu is assigned to pilot that same machine - Blue Destiny. As he uses his new machine and clashes with Zeon ace Nimbus Schterzen, Yuu learns that there may be more to the enigmatic Blue Destiny and its EXAM System than he previously thought.

altTitles.ja: 東京 ─四季─

description.en:
**Volume 1**

_As for the tutoring fee, you can pay me with sex._

Saotome Kyouhei, a Rōnin student, runs into Jinguuji Yuito—a classmate of his, who got into the university he had failed to get into, with the highest score.
Born into a strict family where everyone is accomplished, Kyouhei was raised to become a model student, but he finds himself backed into a corner after facing his first setback, namely, failing to get admitted into university.
Jinguuji approaches Kyouhei offering to become his private tutor in exchange for sex.
Although he dislikes it, Kyouhei gets completely caught up in Jinguuji's sadistic acts as he grows extremely obsessed with Kyouhei…

A love story spanning four seasons in Tokyo, including, Autumn, Winter, and Summer.

**Volume 2**

_It'd be in our best interests to not know anything about each other.
It will become a mess otherwise._

On a sweltering summer night, the star of his advertising agency, Yagami, starts a no-strings-attached relationship with a certain man he met at a gay bar.
The man was easy on the eyes and wore a suit despite it being the middle of summer which screamed elite. Yet, he was inexperienced, a virgin through and through.
Yagami didn't even know his name—their relationship was purely physical.
Besides the sex, dragging in anything else was forbidden—that was their relationship, and that's how it was supposed to be... The man had courage and respected Yagami's boundaries, but before he knew it, Yagami began to catch feelings for him.

Yagami had never intended to get serious. That was how things were supposed to be...??

A love story spanning four seasons in Tokyo, Summer.
Also includes 'Spring' - a story of Kazuma and Ren from Tokyo in April!

But when a mysterious being calling itself “the King” gives him a skill of his own, Taehyeon gets a second chance at life. Now he’s back in high school and armed with Gluttony, a skill that allows him to block and absorb the skills of others!

description.az: Bu twitter qısa hekayəsi məktəbdən kənarda oğlan kimi səhv saldığı orta məktəbli qızla onun sinif yoldaşı arasındakı sevgi hekayəsini təsvir edir. Nəhayət,qızlar rok musiqisindəki ortaq zövqləri üzərində birləşirlər.
description.en:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
description.fr:
Une histoire très appréciée sur Twitter sur fond de musique de Rock.

Aya, une populaire lycéenne tombe sous le charme du discret vendeur du magasin de musique qu'elle fréquente.

Retour en classe, elle raconte toute l'histoire à ses amies et comment elle a un faible pour ce garçon aux airs de prince charmant.

Ce qu'elle ne sait pas c'est que ce mystérieux vendeur n'est en fait que sa voisine de bureau , Mitsuki, qu'elle a confondu pour un jeune homme.

Comment leur relation va-t-elle évolué ? Arriveront elles à expliquer ce quiproquo ?
description.id:
Series Pendek Twitter yang menggambarkan cerita tentang Gyaru dan Teman Sekelasnya.
Gyaru yang suka musik rock dan sering mendatangi toko kaset jatuh cinta ke pekerja paruh waktu yang bekerja disitu, tapi sedikit dia tahu ternyata pekerjanya itu perempuan dan teman sekelasnya.
